channel.title: eternal blue on Stefan Tobler
channel.description: Recent content in eternal blue on Stefan Tobler

item.title: Blue
item.description: Tools # metasploit nmap Walkthrough # First things first. Let’s conduct a scan on the box using the command nmap -sS -sV -A $IP and pipe the output to the file nmap_out.txt. You can review the scan results there. Looking at the results the machine is running Windows 7 Professional 7601. If we google this version number we can find out that this version might be vulnerable to the “EternalBlue” (MS17-010) vulnerability.
